    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera(float fov,
              float aspect,
              float zNear,
              float zFar)
        Parameters:
        fov - The Camera's field of view
        aspect - The Camera's apect, it is recommend that you simply set it to Window width divided by Window height.
        zNear - The closest depth distance, generally something like 0.01f.
        zFar - The furthest depth distance, Example: 1000.0f.

    • Method Detail

      • getViewProjection

        public Matrix4f getViewProjection()
        This allows us to get the camera's view projection.

        This is done by multiplying two Matrices(Camera's rotation and Camera's translation) with the camera's current Matrix projection.

        Returns:
        Updated projection Matrix for the camera object

      • addToEngine

        public void addToEngine(CoreEngine engine)
        A convenience method that overrides it's parent's method.

        Allows us to easily add cameras inside our scene graph by adding it to our Core Engine(Not Rendering Engine!).

        Overrides:
        addToEngine in class GameComponent
        Parameters:
        engine - The Core Engine to which we want to add the camera to.
